name: Web Dev
description: This department brings you up to speed on modern front-end, back-end, and full-stack web development practices and skills.

name: App Dev
description: Have tons of ideas for an app? It’s time to make your ideas into reality. Come learn to design your app with us!

name: Women in Tech
description: As women with the capacity to inspire and lead, we focus on the growth and success of entrepreneurial and innovative women in the technology space.

name: Blockchain
description: Innovate with the Next Frontier in Technology. Learn how the blockchain is leading to a paradigm shift in decentralized application programming.

name: ML/Cloud
description: Whether you’re interested in using the cloud, or want to set up a cloud computing network using Google or Amazon Web Services.

name: CyberSecurity
description: Whether you’re interested in using the cloud, or want to set up a cloud computing network using Google or Amazon Web Services.

name: Marketing
description: Marketing feels overwhelming and we try to tailor your campaigns to your audience in authentic and effective ways.

name: UI/UX
description: Design High-Impact User Experiences. Research, design, and prototype effective, visually-driven websites and apps.

name: Designing
description: To learn a new design, software or start your own design business.
